did.abstract: Letter from Peter J. Brennan to Burton S. Borkan, dated September 7, 1973.

bioghist.p: Peter J. Brennan was Secretary of Labor from 1973 to 1975.
Burtson S. Borkan was Financial Secretary for the Patrolmen's Benevolent Association of the City of New York.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from Peter J. Brennan to Burton S. Borkan, dated September 7, 1973.
